name: Sir Erwin
message: Hey you little scum, what are you doing in here?

name: Sir Erwin
message: Surely you are lost, go back to where you came from

name: Traveler
message: Im here to deliver you a message...

name: Sir Erwin
message: Speak then, I don't have much time to speak to something like you

name: Traveler
message: The merchant of the city is waiting for you to deliver you the "special thing"

name: Sir Erwin
message: Oh I see, that idiot, he is always late, I will go and see him

name: Sir Erwin
message: Now get out of here, I don't want to see you again...

name: Sir Erwin
message: Why are you still here? I told you to leave
